content.rendered:
When I’m on the hunt for that perfect bouquet for someone special, only the best will do. I’m usually looking for something specific – Peonies, Hydrangeas or Dahlias are an absolute favourite when in season! There’s no shortage of florists near me so I’ve put together this simple guide to finding the best florist or floral studio to meet your needs.

What Should I Look For in Florists Near Me?

OUR FLORAL COLLECTION

Fresh Flowers

En masse – Minimalist design

Gift Hampers

Gifts

Indoor Plants

This list is reflective of how we’ve designed our service offering at LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio. We provide the very best florals and foliages with a range of add-on options to give the Gold Coast a stunning, luxurious gifting option for every occasion or for regular deliveries for the home and office. Situated in Gold Coast, LULLY & ROSE offers luxury floral artistry. Specialising in fragrant, textured arrangements reflecting the seasons.

Seasonal Varieties

No matter where I am, I want to know that the florists near me are working within the seasons. In Australia, we are so lucky to have a huge range of beautiful seasonal varieties. At LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio, we are constantly inspired by the natural beauty of flowers and it’s our vision to evoke that same passion and sense of wonder in everyone who comes into contact with one of our arrangements.

Being a beauty of the natural world, florals and foliages are seasonal in nature. Year-round, our experienced florists create seasonal arrangements you’ll adore, from summer Dahlias to winter’s elegant Tulips and spring’s stunning Peonies. Of course, our gorgeous Australian climate means we have beautiful florals and foliages available all throughout the year. Here at LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio, one of our all-year-round favourite combinations are Cottage Roses paired with Ivy Berry. So, no matter what time of year you’re ordering from us, you can rest assured that you’ll receive nothing short of completely stunning.

Services

If there’s a need for you to decorate flowers for an event, we’ve got you covered. For more information about our event florist and corporate flower arrangement services, visit here. Additionally, if you need flowers delivered to Gold Coast University Hospital or Gold Coast Private Hospital, we offer reliable hospital flower delivery services to ensure your loved ones receive a beautiful arrangement to brighten their day. To check our delivery suburbs and pricing, please visit our Delivery Suburbs and Pricing page

Product Range

Once I explore the florists near me and find somewhere I love, I want them to be my ongoing go-to for anything floral. That’s why we value a versatile product range. When you come to us for any occasion, rest assured that we provide items that suit you, backed by our reputation for high-quality florals and service.

Some of our best all-rounder products are our Designer Posies and Designer Vase Arrangements. You’ll also find luxe Gift Hampers, Phalaenopsis Orchids for the plant lovers, Signature Floral Hearts and En Masse arrangements for maximum impact, Fresh Florals for Home and Corporate Arrangements, and so much more! At LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio we absolutely adore designing your arrangements, so please don’t hesitate to get in touch with us if you’re after something specific.

We are also able to offer florals for your next anniversary, milestone, birthday, or corporate fundraiser. We would love to hear from you to discuss your floral desires, and delighted to quote you on a range of options to suit your needs.

Pricing Range

I know that my budget is always a consideration when I’m researching florists near me, so that’s why we have a range of options available for you to explore with LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio. One of the simplest ways to ensure we’re providing something for everyone is that we give you the option to choose the size of your arrangement, with options varying from Petite to Standard, Generous, Lush or Lux.

A great budget-friendly option from our range is the Fresh Florals For Home, a simple bunch of market flowers that are sure to leave an impression. They can be displayed as is for an organic look, or arranged to your heart’s desire around your home. These are perfect for gifting as a little pick-me-up or as a regular delivery to brighten up your space.

Gift Add-Ons

An option I love having from florists near me is the ability to add some extra touches to an arrangement for a truly special gift. At LULLY & ROSE, choose from diverse add-ons for any product or indulge with our lavish gift hampers. Your choice.

Aligned with our community support philosophy, we source add-ons from local Australian businesses, certain you’ll love these offerings. Choose from our gift range today to add that little touch of luxe.

Loco Love Artisan Chocolates

For chocolates, we can’t go past Loco Love Artisan Chocolates. Crafted with premium organic plant-based superfoods, tonic herbs, healing spices, and fair-trade Criollo Cacao from Peru to create unique blends. Based in the rolling hills of Byron Bay, New South Wales, Australia.

Romy Louise Candles

When it comes to anything aroma, we love Romy Louise Candles. Handcrafted excellence meets inspiration drawn from the serene beauty of Toowoomba. Their Classic Collection embodies relaxation with earthy, fruity, floral scents. Their Artisan Collection inspired by botanical parks and cherished memories of Toowoomba.

Designer Georg Jensen Sparkling Wine

Opt for Designer Georg Jensen Sparkling Wine or elevate further with exquisite French Champagne – choices catering to bubbly lover.

Marmoset Found

Some of our arrangements can also be displayed and delivered in artisanal Marmoset Found hand made clay & glass vessels. Marmoset Found employs earthy, seasonal palettes in designs meant to outlast trends and enhance your home’s beauty year-round.

Same Day Delivery

There’s something I can’t do without when shopping from florists near me, or sending flowers to a friend in another state and that’s same day delivery! LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio offers same day delivery for orders placed before 11am. All LULLY & ROSE florals are wrapped in our signature white wrap with luxe rose gold ribbon, or arranged beautifully in one of our contemporary glass or artisanal handcrafted clay vessels.

Specialising in floral transport, Avidity Deliveries ensures flowers reach you with the same care as their creation. Avidity Deliveries, our floral courier, guarantees lasting freshness by transporting your flowers under optimal conditions from departure to delivery. There’s something special about receiving something hand-delivered from a company who really cares.

Fresh & Locally Sourced

When I’m researching florists near me, I want to know where my florals are coming from and I want them to last. At LULLY & ROSE we source our florals on the day from the flower markets ensuring the highest level of freshness and quality. We hand-pick our florals and foliages from local Australian growers wherever possible so you can be confident in supporting local when you shop with LULLY & ROSE.

Because we hand-pick your florals ourselves enables us limitless creativity. Our style is a nod to the latest trends from Melbourne and Sydney blending luxury and minimalism for maximum effect. Our designs showcase the natural beauty of flowers. Witnessing them, we’re sure you’ll be equally enthralled and inspired..

Knowledge & Experience

When looking for florists near me, I want to know that I’m ordering from a qualified florist who knows the ins and outs of design and all the techniques to help flowers last and has an eye for quality. Rachael founded LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio in 2019. Her passion for exquisite florals and luxe design is evident. With over 10 years of industry experience, Rachael is a qualified floral designer. The floral design studio she created embodies her vision. The Gold Coast studio is a haven of perfumed, seasonal, textured florals and foliages.

We offer to our customers our ‘Leave It To Us’ colour and styling option when ordering, as our customers entrust us to come up with something incredible just for them.

Reviews

Last but not least, don’t forget to check the reviews! Beyond doing your research on florists, ensuring they’re qualified and can create what you’re looking for. Reviews are a really good indication of their service and capability. Customer reviews with arrangement photos are invaluable. They showcase our high standards and the love our loyal customers have for us who we are so grateful for.

The next time you’re searching for flowers nearby, finding the right florist or flower shop is key. So, when you’re in need of flowers and search for “florist flower shop near me,” “flower shop florist near me,” “flower arrangements near me,” “flowers closest to me,” or “shop flowers near me.” Order from LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio consider us for a touch of luxury to any occasion, and let us help you brighten someone’s day!

If you’re unable to order from us, be sure to refer back to these tips when choosing a distant florist for future reference outside Gold Coast.

SHOP HERE
